task.title: Enable gradient mode
task.shortdesc: How to enable gradient mode on the Valusin 10" ring light.

step.cmd: Press and hold the “RGB” button for 3-5 seconds, and the ring light will enter gradient mode. While in gradient mode, the color will slowly cycle from red, yellow, green, light blue, blue, purple, and pink. Press the “M” button to return to standard mode. The RGB mode button is a circle labeled with the letters R, G and B
